full_text: IMPORTANT MESSAGE FOR TK DATE 02/12/03 TIME 5:45 P.M. TELEPHONED PLEASE CALL MESSAGE DOJ Redaction 917 991 SIGNED IMPORTANT MESSAGE FOR Sarah DATE 02/10/03 TIME 12:45 P.M. TELEPHONED PLEASE CALL SIGNED IMPORTANT MESSAGE FOR Sarah DATE 02/20/03 TIME 2:45 P.M. OF 1.45 6 Lowell SIGNED IMPORTANT MESSAGE FOR JE DATE 18/02/03 TIME 15:10 P.M. M JEFF SCIENTIST GOVERNMENT EXHIBIT 2-Q-R S2 20 Cr. 330 (AJN)
additional_notes: The document appears to be a set of four 'Important Message' forms, likely used for recording phone messages or visitor information. The forms contain handwritten notes and stamps, including a 'DOJ Redaction' stamp indicating that some information has been redacted. The document is yellowed and has a spiral binding on the left side.
